nodes.beat: Jack, a Minecraft player, receives a magical bean in a trade with a villager.
Jack plants the bean, which grows into a giant beanstalk overnight.
Jack, equipped with his Minecraft gear, starts climbing the beanstalk.
At the top, Jack finds a castle inhabited by a hostile giant.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of gold.
The giant discovers Jack and chases him.
Jack escapes the castle and slides down the beanstalk.
Jack uses his diamond axe to chop down the beanstalk, causing the giant to fall and vanish.
Jack uses the gold to improve his Minecraft village.
Jack plants the bean, which grows into a giant beanstalk reaching the Nether.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of enchantment books.
Jack escapes the castle and uses an Ender Pearl to teleport back to his village.
Jack uses the enchantment books to upgrade his gear.
Jack, a Minecraft player, finds a magical bean while mining.
At the top, Jack finds a castle inhabited by a group of hostile Endermen.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of diamonds.
The Endermen discover Jack and chase him.
Jack uses the diamonds to craft diamond armor and tools.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of Ender Pearls.
Jack uses the Ender Pearls to reach the End and defeat the Ender Dragon.
Jack plants the bean, which grows into a giant beanstalk reaching the Sky Dimension.
At the top, Jack finds a castle inhabited by the Wither.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of Nether Stars.
The Wither discovers Jack and chases him.
Jack uses the Nether Stars to create beacons and improve his village.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of Elytras.
Jack uses the Elytras to fly around and explore the Minecraft world.
Jack, a Minecraft player, receives a magical bean as a rare loot from a Creeper.
At the top, Jack finds a castle inhabited by a group of hostile Illagers.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of Totems of Undying.
The Illagers discover Jack and chase him.
Jack uses the Totems of Undying to protect his village from future attacks.
Jack sneaks into the castle and finds a chest full of Crossbows.
Jack uses the Crossbows to defend his village from hostile mobs.
